content: Who is really paying for the majority of all this? What is the bill to the American people? I do wish we had a true forensic autopsy of the cost involved. We need a detailed makeup of the affects at the local level. We still have no picture of his accumulated debt before or after he was put into office. What is going on with the court cases involving him, his family and or his companies? We still have no disclosure. Keep asking the hard questions. A lot of precedence are being set here.
